name: Hero-U: Rogue to Redemption
description: Hero-U: Rogue to Redemption is a humorous role-playing adventure game by Lori and Corey Cole, creators of the acclaimed Quest for Glory series. Players take on the role of Shawn O'Conner at Hero University. Shawn will make friends, explore the haunted castle, and use his Rogue skills for fun and profit.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10, 8, 7, or Vista Processor: 2 GHz or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD3000 or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 8 GB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 8 GB available space
